required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Food Effect of Sarpogrelate HCl CR Formulation in Comparison to Immediate-release Formulation
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Single Dose, 3-Treatment, 3-Period Williams-Design to Assess the Pharmacokinetic Characteristics and Food Effect of Sarpogrelate HCl CR Tablets Compared With Sarpogrelate HCl IR Tablets in Healthy Male Subjects

oversight_info.authority: South Korea: Korea Food and Drug Administration (KFDA)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics of sarpogrelate controlled-release formulation (CR) in comparison to immediate-release formulation (IR) and Food effect on the pharmacokinetics of sarpogrelate CR.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.description: Active Comparator : predose(0), 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 6(immediately before 2nd drug intake) , 6.25, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 9, 12(immediately before 3rd drug intake), 12.5, 13, 13.5, 14, 15, 16, 24 hours post-dose Experimental : predose(0), 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24 hours post-dose

Active Comparator : predose(0), 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 6(immediately before 2nd drug intake) , 6.25, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 9,12(immediately before 3rd drug intake), 12.5, 13, 13.5, 14, 15, 16, 24 hours post-dose Experimental : predose(0), 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.description: Active Comparator : predose(0), 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 6(immediately before 2nd drug intake) , 6.25, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 9, 12(immediately before 3rd drug intake), 12.5, 13, 13.5, 14, 15, 16, 24 hours post-dose Experimental : predose(0), 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24 hours post-dose

Active Comparator : predose(0), 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 6(immediately before 2nd drug intake) , 6.25, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 9,12(immediately before 3rd drug intake), 12.5, 13, 13.5, 14, 15, 16, 24 hours post-dose Experimental : predose(0), 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24 hours post-dose

arm_group.description: Sarpogrelate HCl 300mg once a day or 100mg three times a day
Sarpogrelate HCl 300mg once a day or 100mg three times a day

intervention.description: Sarpogrelate HCl 300mg once a day or 100mg three times a day
Sarpogrelate HCl 300mg once a day or 100mg three times a day

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 20 to 55 years of healthy volunteers
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hypersensitivity Reaction about Sarpogrelate HCl or other antiplatelets
